vlive.korean: 생수를 들고 다니면 무거워서 마시게 돼요? If I carry around a bottle of water, I will drink because it's too heavy? 듣기 View video TWICE : 원스!
vlive.english: If I carry around a bottle of water, I will drink because it's too heavy?

vlive.korean: 그거 무거워서 어떻게 들고 다녀? because how can you carry such heavy things? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [NCT] 말로 짜티 끓이는 마끄와 푸두에 내 잇몸 지금 물 다뺀 뻑뻑한 짜티야 (So cute MARK&HAECHAN)
vlive.english: because how can you carry such heavy things?

vlive.korean: 손가락에 붕대 감아서 무거워서 그런가? Is it because my finger cast is too heavy? 듣기 View video INFINITE : 남우현(Nam Woo Hyun) “Hold On Me” Ep.3
vlive.english: Is it because my finger cast is too heavy?

vlive.korean: 아 이게 왜그런지 알겠다 이게 너무 무거워서 그런 거였어. I know why it's like this. It was way too heavy. 듣기 View video fromis_9 : 만들어보'새롬' - DIY편
vlive.english: I know why it's like this. It was way too heavy.

vlive.korean: 항상 두고 다녀 무거워서. I always just leave it... Since it's heavy. 듣기 View video 컨버전스 TV (CONS TV) : 악동탐정스 시즌2 15화 <스나이퍼 예매사건 Ⅲ>
vlive.english: I always just leave it... Since it's heavy.

examples.korean: The box is too heavy for me to lift. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 상자가 너무 무거워서 들 수 없다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The box is too heavy for me to lift. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I was weighed down with baggage. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 짐이 무거워서 움직이기가 어려웠다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I was weighed down with baggage. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: burdens too grievous to be borne 듣기 Add to Wordbook 너무 무거워서 나를 수 없는 짐. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: burdens too grievous to be borne Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It’s heavy, so I can’t move it by myself. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 무거워서 혼자 옮길 수가 없어요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’s heavy, so I can’t move it by myself. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I droped the box because it's heavy. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 상자가 무거워서 나는 그것을 떨어뜨렸어요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I droped the box because it's heavy. Add to Wordbook
